title: Graham Nixon from Resist Records & Manager of Parkway Drive
itunes:title: Graham Nixon from Resist Records & Manager of Parkway Drive
description:
Episode 165 - Sorry for the break last week, but I needed a break and well you just have to deal with it. We are back with glimpse at the life of a record label outside of the United States. I rang up Graham Nixon from Resist Records, as well as the manager of metal-core giants Parkway Drive, to discuss finding what you are passionate about, representing an entire country to the music world and one of my favorite subjects, golf. It's a great insight to how things operate on an international level within independent music. MONTHLY DONATIONONE TIME DONATION

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
